divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home to Morton back from Peoria when a light in the sky caught my attention . That's when I realized there were two glowing orbs . They were aprox 100 yards apart . Staying exactly in line with one another. I watched them for about 15 mins they didn't moved but suddenly just faded away until I could no longer see them. Being night and the fact I was driving its hard to judge how far away the objects were. I couldn't make out any details other than shape and colors. So I suspect at least a few miles . Similar has been sited in this area several times in the last year or so. This I'd the second UFO I've seen in a year as well. The other was a triangle not a orb like these.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in East Peoria
There were no other sightings in East Peoria on or around February 23rd 2013
Summary: 2 glowing metallic orbs floating in the sky. Suddenly faded then vanished
